_meanings:
{@--1@} An 
unwarrantable stretch of a rule or principle.

{@--2@} Including what is not intended
to be included in a proposition;
(in NyƒÅya) including or 
covering too much, unwarranted

so that it includes such things as
ought not to fall under it; one of

definition is open; {#alakzye lakzaRagamanaM#}
